title: Item Concept - Iron Fortress
body:
I created this item because Void Staff and Last Whisper have little to no counter play.

Grants:
350 HEALTH
75 ARMOUR
35 MAGIC RESIST

UNIQUE PASSIVE: Impenetrable
The bearer takes 10% less damage from all sources (except true damage) before resistances. If the damage source has an item or passive effect that would penetrate armour or magic resist, this effect is doubled for that damage instance.

Say what you want about tanks being OP, you don't know how to counter them if you have such thoughts.

replies.body: So you just want to effectively make penetration half as good? I have been in fights as a tank against people for LW or VS and been fine and taken tickle damage. I don't know what you're on about about them having no counter play.

I think that there is enough ways to deal with LW and VS. 

Just balance on the line between health stacking and resistance stacking.

I find that even though the items burn through 40% of your resistances, if you keep stacking then your defensive capabilities WILL still go up.
